org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting
Class SimplePaintVisitor

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting.BasePaintVisitor
      org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting.SimplePaintVisitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visitor, IPlugin, IPaintVisitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
SmoothTilePainter, TilePaintVisitor
public class SimplePaintVisitor
extends BasePaintVisitor

A visitor that paint a simple scheme of every primitive it visits to a previous set graphic environment.

Author:
Marcus Wolschon
